elements.title: Salar del Huasco (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the designation of Salar del Huasco (pictured) as a national park in 2010 was revoked in 2014?

elements.title: Jo-anne Wilkinson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jo-anne Wilkinson and Graeme Dingle crossed the Bering Sea in a leaking boat?

elements.title: Archbishop Lando of Messina (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Archbishop Lando of Messina abandoned his archdiocese in 1238 and spent the rest of his life in his hometown of Anagni?

elements.title: an Illinois radio station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that an Illinois radio station closed down to reduce interference with television reception?

elements.title: Bob Moore (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Bob Moore did not found Bob's Red Mill until after his first retirement?

elements.title: Beebo the God of War (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the titular character in "Beebo the God of War" was inspired by Tickle Me Elmo?

elements.title: Alfred de Laage de Meux (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Alfred de Laage de Meux received the rank of brevet without completing aviation school?

elements.title: skeleton panda sea squirt (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the skeleton panda sea squirt was known on the Internet for its skeleton-like appearance years before its formal description?
